website_summaries.verdict: This is a manual trash compactor for those looking for an inexpensive way to condense their garbage output.
pros: Thick stainless steel does not smudge or show fingerprints
cons: Some owners have expressed concerns about the compactor's durability over time

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnets and low grade stainless.
customer_reviews.text: Magnets holding the Krusher part up are too weak. The Krusher routinely falls into the garbage. We live on a boat and rust is a constant problem in the salt air. This can says it is stainless steel, but magnets easily stick to it and it started rusting in just 6 months. Neither of those things should happen, especially for the price of $160. Good concept, but poor execution. Won't buy again without serious improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can for 30 days !!!
customer_reviews.text: Breaks in the first month ! If you want something that lasts 30 days then breaks this is the trash can for you! There are four tiny little Phillips head screws that hold the lid on. They strip right out and do not hold rendering the trash can useless. I took some sheet metal screws with a 5/16 head and put them in place of the eyeglass screws that it comes with. See attached pic.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, good quality and appearance is nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, its a little to nasty having to put your hand in the trash can to press down and compact the contain of it. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: PRIVATE

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have had this can for 9 months and the screws that attach the lid frame to the base have all come out because they were set in cheap plastic. As you use the lid opening the plastic weakens and breaks apart - VERY disappointing as it is not repairable.
customer_reviews.author: Azrealle65

customer_reviews.title: One mans trash is another mans compacted trash
customer_reviews.text: I told my tenants it was a trash compactor then left to see if they could figure it out. They weren’t sure how to turn it on. I told them to push the big button with the handle In the middle of the lid down firmly until it met resistance. then pull back up until the magnets reattached the lid. Works pretty damn well. I have less overflow on garbage day and don’t have to chase down the wayward Patti LaBelle cobbler box that gets carried away by raccoons or the wind. Mmm. Blackberry cobbler.
customer_reviews.author: T. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love the trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: I love the trashcan. It works well and it’s attractive (for a trash can). I gave it only three stars because it took me a month to get and when I finally did, it has a huge dent in it. It’s a hassle to return and I don’t want to wait another month to get a new one, but I’m bummed because the dent is right on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice! Saves on Trash bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks, I never said that about a trash can before. I noticed the bag was at least twice as heavy as before, should save us money on bags and time taking out trash. What I do when bag gets about half full start compacting, I do 4 plunges,top left top right etc as compacter is not as big as container, you should get 40 to 55 percent more trash per bag. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hold twice the garbage/recycling
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these! They are so awesome! Only problem is if you compress to much you cannot get the bag out! But that’s nothing the manufacture can help
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice along with other stainless steel appliances. Would have rather have had an automatic trash compactor but $600 or more was a little pricey. This works quite well. Can get twice the trash in one bag. Fits well under the end of our counter. Compact and yet holds quite a bit. Wouldn’t recommend for an elderly person as it does take a little strength to push trash down.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: TK Essentials 10XL Compacting Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: The trash can is large. A 13 gallon trash bag barely fits the inside can. The inside can is very difficult to lift out when full. There is nothing to grab a hold of to lift out. The trash bag tears and is difficult to lift out of the can. The top part of the can that you use to push down the trash is difficult to snap back into place. The force of the compact relying solely on your weight to push it down.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good value
customer_reviews.text: This trash can works well for my family. The lid keeps the dogs out and the compactor helps my family of 6 limit our trash. This is our second one, our first lived a good life before the lid broke. I did add a small cushion under the pedal to open the lid. My kids like to stomp it and scratched my hardwood floor a little bit, but it works great with the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A JOKE
customer_reviews.text: IT LOOKS GOOD, BUT IT DOES NOT DO THE JOB. WHEN IT LOOKED FULL, I REMOVED THE BAG, AND DUE TO THE BAG BEING LARGER THAN THE CONTAINER--WHAT WAS TO BE COMPRESSED SIMPLY SPREAD OUT IN THE BAG--AND NOW THE BAG HAD ROOM FOR MUCH MORE?? CAN'T RETURN THE BAGS--BUT THIS UNIT IS GONE. MY FAULT--I SHOULD HAVE KNOWN BETTER. WHAT A WASTE OF TIME AND EFFORT.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Garbage Can!
customer_reviews.text: This looks good. The shininess doesn't get all smeared up and best of all you can easily compress your trash to avoid excessive emptying. My daughter loved it and she is ordering one. Worth the price to me who was used to an automatic trash compacter in my previous home.
customer_reviews.author: DB Rose

customer_reviews.title: Lid Falls off into the trash
customer_reviews.text: If you leave the trashcan against a wall the force of the lid hitting the wall results in the handle portion of the lid falling into the trashcan. Mind you we are not stomping on the opening mechanism, normal applied pressure opens the lid quickly and pops the handle loose. Qualify finish, does a great job of compacting the trash, feels solid all around. Just don't put it next to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a problem as soon as I started using ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem as soon as I started using it. The lid (krusher handle) would fall off everytime I opened and closed. not worth the money for this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Abad

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was everything as advertised. Many times I do not use the compactor lid due to the trash is often ready to go out by time it is full. Sometimes I do use the lid and very successfully. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Draper

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a well engineered device. Soft close lid, lid lock open feature, can within a can that pulls out to fit the bag on, well constructed, and the trash compacting feature. We love it and everyone who sees it wants one.
customer_reviews.author: NMSam

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great for qbout a week.
customer_reviews.text: The lids quiet close broke as well as the magnets holding the crusher to the lid. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NonnieV

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking can that will save a lot of trips to the dumpster. Only problem is the lever to hold the lid up is a soft plastic that is easily broken.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can came in with a huge dent in the side of the can. The compressing lid is hard to maneuver and it’s just easier to you whatever you are throwing away to guard your hand and compress the trash yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is easy to use. The manual compaction reduces the volume of trash by about a third. It could be a little more depending on contents. I used mine for kitchen trash and had all sorts of items. It works very well. I may buy another for teenage son's room!
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Red

customer_reviews.title: No Top
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great but had to top to push stuff down!!! Trying to find the company now.
customer_reviews.author: O. Hasemann

customer_reviews.title: Using the dust pan to smash your trash is cheaper than this junk!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! It’s a regular trash can basically! I can push the trash down with the dust pan like I’ve been doing for years and it won’t cost me $100 bucks. Don’t waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Chism

customer_reviews.title: The Garbage Can Size is Great
customer_reviews.text: The size of the can is great. With the liner it is very easy to lift a fully packed garbage bag out of the container. As far as the crusher part, it's silly, it easier just to put gloves on and push the garbage down further compacting it manually. The crusher section which is held on the lid by magnets does reattach easily.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Nice find
customer_reviews.text: Although I do know it's a bit pricey...it's only downfall...I also know it works just as dipicted. Easy to use and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: gr8mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen Trashcan
customer_reviews.text: able to push this down and use each bag twice instead of once
customer_reviews.author: JAMES P MEDENDORP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what was described and perfect for my needs. The traditional old style compactors became dirty and smelly. This one, with manual compressing pad, which can be very easily cleaned. I m very happy with my Trash Krusher 50L.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Ants
customer_reviews.text: After about a week. We got ants. And we never had them before. They were crawling out of the trash can so I'm pretty sure that's where they came from.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Tiberi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great size, fits normal trash bags, East to remove trash bags once full, it does not seem to be finger print resistant but it is easy to clean. The compactor works great and the whole product feels strong/durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S

customer_reviews.title: Fit 4 times the trash in each bag!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I got this a week ago and my trash is half full, I live in a house with2 other people and our conduction levels are average. This will save you trashbags 4-1
customer_reviews.author: RedHotDankMoist

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I was afraid it would be hard to take the bag out of the can once it was full, but the bag slid right out.
customer_reviews.author: Quarterly Report

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This one really works. I absolutely love it. A bit over priced since it’s a manual compactor. Also it does leave fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: OW

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in April 2020 today it broke. The metal piece that let's the lid fall back down slowly has broken off now im stuck with a $145 trash can that slams and the insert for pushing the trash down falls into trash can..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, does the job. This is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I love the wat the lid closes softly and slowly no slamming. It is a very nice size and is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra, from WV

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Designed to look like high tech. Its just a removable cut out in the lid that allows you to --- (wait for it) ---- push your trash down with the power of your own arm ! Seriously ? Not worth the 100 plus bucks, at all.
customer_reviews.author: mike smith

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you receive
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok but VERY expensive. The handle is cheap and cumbersome to use. Costco has a similar and better made for $60. I should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: WEB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: There was a huge dent in the right side and a broken piece of plastic inside which I'm not sure where it goes. For the price, I would not buy again but its too big and bulky for me to repack and send back.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this trashcan, but it keeps breaking. We already returned the first one for a new one and now the second has done the same thing! The screws come loose and you can't open it! I'm very disappointed as we paid so much for the item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but already broken
customer_reviews.text: Great looking can, but after just a couple weeks of using it the soft close doesn't work. It slams open and closed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to dent and wrong dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The dent was an instant return, but I also noticed that the 40L option's dimensions are in error: it is 25.5 inches high like the 50L.
customer_reviews.author: ASK

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. There was a dent in the front of the trashcan and the lid did not close correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Arthur Russell

customer_reviews.title: This is not a trash compactor just a trash can. Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: Just a fancy every day trash can. Nithing special. Freight through USPS was slow and added three days to the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: randy r.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: The top lid falls off when it closes. Defective engineering. I tried it for over a month. And now can't get our money back from Amazon. Very sad!
customer_reviews.author: Avid comparison shopper

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: Came dented. Not worth returning so I'll just give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Willows

customer_reviews.title: 99 for a garbage can.
customer_reviews.text: about worthless... 139.99 for a garbage can... the crusher unit constantly falls in.... could be placed on rail instead of free falling to ensure better uniformity.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My trash is only collected once a week so this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works wonderfully, great as a starter before considering a electric compactor
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print!
customer_reviews.text: Or just read the large print. Once upon a time I got a real trash compactor. As in a weeks worth of trash was bundled neatly into a very small package. This is clearly named Trash KRUSHER, It is not automated. In stead of stomping on the trash with your work boots you use the the lid. It's way better than boots I'm keeping until I can find a trash compactor.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Lamar

customer_reviews.title: ... trash can to keep my dog out of the garbage and to be able to compact my garbage as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen trash can to keep my dog out of the garbage and to be able to compact my garbage as much as I could without a trash compactor. This does both.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Has cut garbage bag use in half
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.Has cut garbage bag use in half.Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MSsatisified customer

customer_reviews.title: This compactor is top of the line. You only ...
customer_reviews.text: This compactor is top of the line. You only use as much force as necessary. Much of what needs to be compacted is only loose plastic or cardboard items such as cups or milk cartons. Very simple to use and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonduke

customer_reviews.title: Replace a Simple Human can with an automatic lid because ...
customer_reviews.text: Replace a Simple Human can with an automatic lid because Simple Human doesn't fit well with traditional trash bags and the automatic lid ran through a lot of batteries. This can fits standard bags and effectively holds 2-3 times as much trash. The foot pedal opener is just as convenient.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: less trips outside in the winter!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome. Kind of funny that I am actually rating a "trash can". haha. But, I'm telling you, get some good trash compactor bags in this thing and you can manually smash down the trash and make trips "outside" a thing of the "daily task" a thing of the past you have to do. We have limited trash space in our current trash bin so being able to pack it down before going into the bin saves our family of 6 money by not having to have a second trash container to store trash in. Yes, it has now paid for itself if you find yourself in a similar large family situation.
customer_reviews.author: stormer

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Worked for about 5 mins then the lid ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Worked for about 5 mins then the lid no longer lowered slowly, it slams shut, this causes the compactor to fall into the trash. Just received it today and I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really love this trash compactor August 25, after having this trash compactor for four moths I am having issues with the compacter lid falling into the trash every time we put trash in and close the lid. Im thinking that maybe the magnets give out after several uses. Maybe in the future they need to put stronger magnets on the compactor lid. I still think its a great trash can but I am changing by stars from five to four.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very dog resistant!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are both clever and stubborn, but we have no closed cabinet for a trashcan. They have thus far been unable to get into this can! Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Kille

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bags lift easily out of can,holds a 13 gallon bag, compactor lid works great, and nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a trash compactor many years but this one is bigger and stylish .
customer_reviews.author: Linda lanham

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Best trash can I've ever had!! I like it even better than the Simple Human versions I've tried. The compacting function is easy and works great. My husband really likes this can, too!
customer_reviews.author: Nance E

customer_reviews.title: Where is the "lot number" for this great product so I can submit warranty registration?
customer_reviews.text: Love it but cannot find the "lot number" on packaging so I can submit the warranty. It will be a 5 when someone tells me which number it is. THANKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super fast shipping! I've seen some concerns about the compactor piece falling into the can, this piece clips into the frame easily. Just pull gently on both sides until you here it click back in and it will not fall into the can. Yes, it has magnets to assist with placement but there are brackets on both sides to hold it as well. It explains this in the instructions. It can dent easily so just make sure your can is in a spot where the lid isn't obstructed in any way. We can get about 5 days out of one garbage bag, it's amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Compactor!
customer_reviews.text: This compactor does not have to be installed and is so easy to use. I use it at a vacation home that does not have trash pickup, and I have to take my trash home with me. It has reduced my bags of trash 75%!
customer_reviews.author: Woman of the 60's

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to an automatic trash compactor
customer_reviews.text: I just hate taking the trash out and wanted a trash compactor but didn't want to spend the money on one. I also didn't have a place to build one in. This is a pretty great option. It really does compact and has significantly reduced number of times we have to empty it. Love that it uses normal bags. Thought odor may be an issue but have had it a month and no issues. Very simple to use. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Love hhi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely "KRUSHES".........Your wallet but just doesnt go the distance.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Purchased in June. By December the Crusher insert was unexplainably just dropping off into the pail. Originally I had given a positive review below But for 160$ price tag I expect some longevity. <<BUYER BEWARE>> "Love it so far. Crushes the trash well. My bag comes out like a compacted rectangle! Just be prepared for a heavier bag!"
customer_reviews.author: Hanomag

customer_reviews.title: The lid will only last about a year before it breaks off, otherwise outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this garbage can. I love how I can compact the trash easily, and not waste trips up and down the stairs to the garbage cans outdoors. What I don't like is the plastic lid only works for about a year before it fails. :( This is the second one I've had. It lasted 13 months this time. Even though Iove the compacting feature, the replacement and failure of the product is no longer worth it to me. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hunter

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. i do worry however that the magnetic manual ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! The slow close broke in 6 days. If the slow close lid breaks, the can is worthless. Seriously.. great concept but does not work. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: too the extreme

customer_reviews.title: The only Trash can you should buy!! The Company customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this product in 2016. A few months ago I noticed it was not functioning with a "quiet close" feature. REMEMBER PURCHASED IN 2016! I contacted their customer service via email and explained and requested a replacement part which I was willing to pay for and repair myself because overall it was a great product. I showed my receipt record from my Amazon account and in less then one week..... A BRAND NEW TRASH KRUSHER ARRIVED AT OUR DOOR! NO CHARGE!! Amazing company, product and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Barb M.

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice. The Krusher part is not OK
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. The Krusher part is not OK, does not fo the job, fells off, etc. What really put mer iff was the fact that the lid hatch broke after a moth and a half. However, the customer service is exceptional: they promptly asked for photos and returned the money next day.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Bam

customer_reviews.title: fewer trips taking the trash out
customer_reviews.text: I like that is compacts the trash down. Too much bulky packaging on products mean lots of wasted space in the trash can. that means more trips taking the trash out. This trash can helps reduce the volume of all that packaging and reduces the number of bags used and the trips taking trash out. It is easy to use. It is also effective keeping the dog out of the trash.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 3 weeks then broke suddenly, It does have 10 years warranty, so I contacted the company and waiting for a reply. UPDATE: They sent a replacement promptly. The first one I purchased from amazon was defective as it broke in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: KAF

customer_reviews.title: More trash, Less Bags Used
customer_reviews.text: I realized one day, with the price of trash bags, I felt I really wanted to get my monies worth out of the bags. I got the trash krusher (manuel). I get more into one trash bag and the trip to the trash can has decreased. You have to use your own body weight and strength to push down on the handle but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Cover is off by a hair or two!
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, compacting function is genius! My only problem is when the cover closes it’s off by just enough it lays crooked on one corner. I have to stay by it and tap the corner To an even fit. Is there an adjustment I could make to solve this problem. Thank you, Joyce Ramsay
customer_reviews.author: Joyce ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The Trash Krusher works as advertised and I had no problems with the crusher staying attached as others have reported. I did have issues with the device that makes the lid close smoothly and quietly. On the first occurrence I contacted customer service and they instructed me on how to repair it. The device still comes out of its socket about once a day. I just have to put it back in but a bit of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Oulapour

customer_reviews.title: Great non- electric trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful trash can. Brushed steel without finger prints. It is not electric but has a lid that is easy to push down and smash the trash. I think we are able to get 2x to 3x more trash in a garbage bag. NY elderly mom and I are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: The trash can is nice, but not that nice for the price. After reading reviews and watching videos I was hyped about receiving this trash can. Everything works as it should, however it is not as easy to operate as the ad says. You have to hold the lid on pretty well to either take off or put back the trash compactor. It is fairly easy to use after that but you will get hands dirty. The size of it allowed for trash to slide on either side of compactor allowing it to get on hands. It's fairly easy to clean though. If the price was 30 dollars less or the operation was better I would give it more stats.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: i like it  works fine Saves $$$$$$  ill tell ya how
customer_reviews.text: when the can gets full all ya do is push down on the handle smash the trash pop the handle back in place and keep putting more trash into the bag . Now i use less trash bags
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: Nice all the way around.
customer_reviews.text: Had this can for about two weeks. It is easy to use & has saved space in my outdoor garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great but the magnets that hold the crusher are just ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great but the magnets that hold the crusher are just not strong enough . The top collapses into the pail too often and it is very annoying to have to be so gentle opening and closing the lid
customer_reviews.author: andrea barouh

customer_reviews.title: Easy operation. Sturdy. Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stainless steel kitchen can. Compacting life is easy to operate & snaps back into the lid as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Zolman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Was nice while it lasted. Spring mechanism is no longer working on the lid; it just slams down. Reached out to their product support over week ago & no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: within one year the product no longer works i.e. the top does not stay in place as appears magnets do not work to hold it in place I will buy from Costco next time due to warranty
customer_reviews.author: Tra

customer_reviews.title: Manual trash compactor
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you can’t get an electric trash compactor. I can get more garbage in it. I love it it works great
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Horn

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: Bought it October 4th, 2018 and it broke today, November 28th. I loved it until today, significantly cut down taking garbage out!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: this product is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: it's manual, so it's MUCH cheaper than a motorized trash compactor, and is very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: terri litty

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic handle does not stick after using it for ...
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic handle does not stick after using it for one month. I would not buy it again unless the model I have is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Carma Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Smashing Good
customer_reviews.text: I don't hear my husband's complaints about taking the trash out as much, because he can pack more and make less trips to the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: CD Fling

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are weak
customer_reviews.text: The can itself has a very nice appearance, however, the magnets are very weak. We have only had this for a few months and the lid drops all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Motivatedteacher

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a plastic canister
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and clean looking. So much better than a plastic canister. Great that you can compact it without having to touch trash with your hand!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks as described and feels like it is built well.
customer_reviews.author: Fr@nk Gu@rin

customer_reviews.title: Great way to reduce my garbage and cut down on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great way to reduce my garbage and cut down on my "Pay as your Throw" bags. Looks cool and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I would give five stars if it held the bag better
customer_reviews.text: It's a pain putting a new bag in this, due to poor design, but once the edges are tucked in this is very easy to use. The bags are VERY strong and I can put anything in the trash. It's extremely easy to use and does a great job of sealing in odors. The problem with the odors is that as soon as it's opened, the smells hit you. I wish their design could handle that.
customer_reviews.author: W. Irvine

customer_reviews.title: 5 +++++stars
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a trash compactor but in my new home I had no place to put one, so I opted for this Trash Krusher and it was the best decision. I could have made. Simple to use and it looks great with my appliances. I use the stretch bags and works perfectly. If I could have given it ten stars I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great, Trash Compactor is Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the idea however this is not the perfect device. The major problem and my reason for 2 stars is that the lid drops into the trash way too often. It is true the lid closes very smoothly; the problem is when you open the lid or even accidentally touch the lid. In this case the compactor portion of the lid fails into the garbage. This always happens when company is visiting! The fix is simple, instead of using magnets to hold the "Compactor Lid" they should use a "Twist to Unlock". This would make this a FIVE STAR Product.
customer_reviews.author: Just_Shoppin

customer_reviews.title: Winner.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. As advertised, it gets at least double the amount of trash as one without the compacting feature. More would make the bag way too heavy. It has an internal liner -- sort of a can within a can -- that the bag goes into and over the rim of. This does a pretty good job of locking the bag in place, and depending on where you put the can may make it slightly easier to change the bag. It does for me. The lid can be locked open, which is very convenient for messy jobs where you just want to toss something in the can and keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Savitzky

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected !!! Super!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can / compactor is better than I imagined. It has decreased my trash bulk tremendously, actually I have 3 times room trash can space! And it's super easy to use! What a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised..this can is great for keeping the trash leveled and the top insert, which u use to push down the trash, snaps back into place and stays there! The dog cannot get into this trash can, lol.
customer_reviews.author: lyb

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it, has cut my trash down by ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it, has cut my trash down by more than half !! And for a family of six that is saying a lot !
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: the compaction device would fall into the trash can – annoying. I ended returning the trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the TK10 Trash Krusher did not meet my expectations. The TK10 is an attractive trash can, but lacks the durability needed for my household. It arrived dented, although well packaged, we thought about keeping it in spite of the minor dent. The TK10 compaction device does not have strong enough magnets to keep it attached to the lid. Practically every time the lid closed, the compaction device would fall into the trash can – annoying. I ended returning the trashcan. Be mindful of the returning shipping cost, expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Trash compactor
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed...It simply is not worth the amount that it is selling for. The compacting piece is not really heavy enough to push the trash down.. About the only thing good that I can say about it is that is is attractive,(for a trash container)
customer_reviews.author: jebbe

product_meta.title: Household Essentials Trash Krusher Manual Trash Compactor, 40 L, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:40 LiterThe TK10 trash krusher has all the features of a modern Stainless Steel trash can with a soft touch Petal and a slow-closing lid, but inside this attractive 40L can is a unique, patented manual trash compactor system. It's easy to use and quiet. Just grab the handle on the lid and push. Your household trash will be crushed. No special bags or electricity is required--just the force of your hand. You'll get Twice as much trash in every bag. A switch lets the lid remain open for longer clean-up Jobs and to makes it easy to empty the trash and change the bags. And the unique locking mechanism ensures that the bag is secured until it is time to take it out. The trash krusher is also easy to clean. Just detach the compaction device from the lid and rinse it with soapy water. Capacity 40 liters. Uses 10 or 13 gallon trash bags. Measure 25.5High, 16wide, 13.5deep with foot pedal.
feature_bullets: Simple manual trash compacting receptacle in fingerprint resistant stainless steel
Soft touch foot petal for easy open and silent slow close lid
Bag locking mechanism keeps bags in place
Capacity 40 liters, uses 10 or 13 gallon trash bags, measure 25.5 high, 16wide, 13.5 deep with foot pedal
